text: Norwegian Pharmacy Association () is a trade organization representing the pharmacies and pharmacy owners in Norway. In addition to the three large chains and hospital pharmacies, 20 independent pharmacists are members of the organization. The Norwegian Pharmacy Association is a trade association for Pharmacies located in Norway. It was established in 1881. http://www.apotek.no/sw102.asp Notable people include Leif Brendel, secretary- general from 1940 to 1968. ==References== ==External links== * Official web site Category:Medical and health organisations based in Norway Category:Pharmacies of Norway Category:Pharmacy-related professional associations Category:1881 establishments in Norway
title: Norwegian Pharmacy Association
